title: Shyvana on TT?
body:
Any chance we could get some sort of help on Twisted Treeline for the dragon lady?  Seeing as there's no dragons to slay and get beefy...

Apologies if this is the gazillionth thread on this.

replies.body:
Meddler already posted some time ago that they are looking into her passive for other maps.
latest i heared was bonus dmg vs vilemaw and armor/mr from slaying vilemaw for TT, and bonus armor/mr for takeing turrets in aram.
Yep. Those changes should be in the next patch.
Same for Aram. She has no passive but you can still be forced to play her.
she also has barly an ult as it's cd is like 5min cause you can't AA alot and you don't get furry while dead, and that hasn't cahnged in years...The dragon sucks in aram, with or without passive.

THAT'S RIGHT RIOT, SHYVANA IN ARAM IS UNPLAYABLE!
U N P L A Y A B L E.
HOW DO YOU PLEA, UH RIOT?
THIS IS AN OUTRAGE!

By the way, thanks on the buffs on shyvana! ^^
